mapper.sql: wa_id, cc_user_id, cc_user_name, cc_user_pwd, mobile, email, xcx_open_id, mp_open_id, real_name, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, language, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from wx_account
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_account (wa_id, cc_user_id, cc_user_name, cc_user_pwd, mobile, email, xcx_open_id, mp_open_id, real_name, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, language, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6 ) values (#{waId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ccUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ccUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccUserPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

wa_id = #{record.waId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cc_user_id = #{record.ccUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cc_user_name = #{record.ccUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update wx_account
cc_user_id = #{ccUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cc_user_name = #{ccUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cc_user_pwd = #{ccUserPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xcx_open_id = #{xcxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mp_open_id = #{mpOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=CHAR},
headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where wa_id = #{waId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wx_account set cc_user_id = #{ccUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cc_user_name = #{ccUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cc_user_pwd = #{ccUserPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xcx_open_id = #{xcxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mp_open_id = #{mpOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=CHAR}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where wa_id = #{waId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT cc_user_id FROM wx_account ORDER BY cc_user_id desc LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM wx_account WHERE wa_id NOT in(SELECT user_id FROM random_draw ) and attribute1!='0' and mp_open_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT wa.*, ypr.`year` FROM wx_account wa LEFT JOIN year_pay_record ypr ON ypr.user_number = wa.attribute3 WHERE ( ypr.pay_status = - 1 OR ypr.pay_status = 1 ) AND wa.mp_open_id IS NOT NULL AND ypr.year = #{year} AND wa.wa_id not in( SELECT user_id FROM random_draw WHERE attribute2 = #{year})
